mapper.select:
select count(*) from bjqcb bj join Unitsaccount un on bj.UnitInfoAccount=un.UnitInfoAccount join UnitInfo uf on un.UnitInfoId=uf.UnitInfoId
and uf.UnitInfoName like "%"#{UnitInfoName}"%"
and bj.bjywllx like "%"#{bjywllx}"%"
and bj.bjjzrq between #{date1} and #{date2}
mapper.sql: bjbh, UnitInfoAccount, grzhbhs, userId, dwbje, grbje, bjrs, bjje, bjny, bjys, bjssje, bjssjedx, bjjkfs, bjjkzt, bjjzrq, bjbz, bjywllx
mapper.insert: insert into bjqcb (bjbh, UnitInfoAccount, grzhbhs, userId, dwbje, grbje, bjrs, bjje, bjny, bjys, bjssje, bjssjedx, bjjkfs, bjjkzt, bjjzrq, bjbz, bjywllx) values (#{bjbh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitinfoaccount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{grzhbhs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dwbje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{grbje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bjrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bjje,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bjny,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bjys,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bjssje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bjssjedx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjjkfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjjkzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjjzrq,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bjbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjywllx,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update bjqcb
UnitInfoAccount = #{unitinfoaccount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
grzhbhs = #{grzhbhs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dwbje = #{dwbje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
grbje = #{grbje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bjrs = #{bjrs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bjje = #{bjje,jdbcType=DATE},
bjny = #{bjny,jdbcType=DATE},
bjys = #{bjys,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bjssje = #{bjssje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bjssjedx = #{bjssjedx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bjjkfs = #{bjjkfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bjjkzt = #{bjjkzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bjjzrq = #{bjjzrq,jdbcType=DATE},
bjbz = #{bjbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bjywllx = #{bjywllx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where bjbh = #{bjbh,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bjqcb set UnitInfoAccount = #{unitinfoaccount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, grzhbhs = #{grzhbhs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dwbje = #{dwbje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, grbje = #{grbje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bjrs = #{bjrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bjje = #{bjje,jdbcType=DATE}, bjny = #{bjny,jdbcType=DATE}, bjys = #{bjys,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bjssje = #{bjssje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bjssjedx = #{bjssjedx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bjjkfs = #{bjjkfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bjjkzt = #{bjjkzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bjjzrq = #{bjjzrq,jdbcType=DATE}, bjbz = #{bjbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bjywllx = #{bjywllx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where bjbh = #{bjbh,jdbcType=INTEGER}
